SummonFX.help: This power is simply the visual fx for when Faathim is released.
SummonFX.targetHelp: This power is simply the visual fx for when Faathim is released.

Heal_Other.help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast
Heal_Other.targetHelp: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Healing_Aura.help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate
Healing_Aura.targetHelp: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Fortitude.help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's Accuracy, damage, and Defense. The target takes less damage from successful attacks. Fortitude also protects the targeted hero from Psionic attacks and damage. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.targetHelp: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's Accuracy, damage, and Defense. The target takes less damage from successful attacks. Fortitude also protects the targeted hero from Psionic attacks and damage. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.attackerHit: You greatly increase the To Hit, Damage and Defense of {PlayerDest}.
Fortitude.victimHit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

Siphon_Power.help: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.
Siphon_Power.targetHelp: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.

Fulcrum_Shift.help: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.
Fulcrum_Shift.targetHelp: Your power has been drained! You are doing less damage than before.

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.targetHelp: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Protection_Shield.help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.shortHelp: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.targetHelp: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.targetShortHelp: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.
